content:
# I have successfully extracted 3 copper plates from the stone furnace, and my inventory now contains:
# - 5 wood
# - 5 stone
# - 3 iron plates
# - 3 copper plates
# - 1 iron gear wheel

# With these resources, I can now craft the electronic circuit, which requires:
# - 3 Copper Cables (crafted from 3 Copper Plates)
# - 1 Iron Plate

# First, I will craft the 3 Copper Cables from the 3 Copper Plates.
craft_item(Prototype.CopperCable, quantity=3)

# After crafting the Copper Cables, I will proceed to craft the electronic circuit using 1 Iron Plate and the 3 Copper Cables.
craft_item(Prototype.ElectronicCircuit, quantity=1)

# Finally, I will check my updated inventory to confirm all the crafted items.
print(f"Inventory after crafting electronic circuit: {inspect_inventory()}")
